quote: Courage is like love; it must have hope for nourishment.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear - not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Without fear there cannot be courage.
author: Christopher Paolini

quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: It is not courage that makes us speak the truth, but it is a hunger for truth that makes us courageous
author: Agona Apell,  The Success Genome Unravelled: Turning Men from Rot to Rock

quote: Courage is found in unlikely places.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Courage isn't having the strength to go on - it is going on when you don't have strength.
author: Napoléon Bonaparte

quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Courage is living by the free will that one creates for themselves, not the life of monotony determined by another.
author: Michelle Cruz-Rosado

quote: Courage, my friends; 'tis not too late to build a better world.
author: Tommy Douglas

quote: Courage is the most important of all the virtues because without courage, you can't practice any other virtue consistently.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: In acting, there's a type of courage you're recognized for all the time. You lose 100 pounds and play a guy with AIDS, and you get rewarded. But, in life, doing what is courageous is quiet, and no one knows about it. Courage is someone making sacrifices for their family or making selfless decisions for what they hope or feel.
author: Rob Lowe

quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quietvoice at the end of the day saying, "I will try again tomorrow.
author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
author: Anais Nin

quote: I wanted you to see what real courage is, instead of getting the idea that courage is a man with a gun in his hand. It's when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what.- Atticus Finch
author: Harper Lee,  To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: Courage to me is doing something daring, no matter how afraid, insecure, intimidated, alone, unworthy, incapable, ridiculed or whatever other paralyzing emotion you might feel. Courage is taking action.....no matter what. So you're afraid? Be afraid. Be scared silly to the point you're trembling and nauseous, but do it anyway!
author: Richelle E. Goodrich,  Smile Anyway: Quotes, Verse, & Grumblings for Every Day of the Year

quote: True courage is in knowing that there is nothing to scare you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it. The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Courage does not always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.
author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quote: It isn't for the moment you are struck that you need courage, but for that long uphill climb back to sanity and faith and security.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: To be brave is to love someone unconditionally, without expecting anything in return. To just give. That takes courage, because we don't want to fall on our faces or leave ourselves open to hurt.
author: Madonna

quote: Courage will now be your best defence against the storm that is at hand-—that and such hope as I bring.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Return of the King

quote: Real courage is when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what.
author: Harper Lee,  To Kill a Mockingbird

quote: Without courage, wisdom bears no fruit.
author: Baltasar Gracián

quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: The courage of life is often a less dramatic spectacle than the courage of a final moment; but it is no less a magnificent mixture of triumph and tragedy.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Pain and suffering are the soil of strength and courage.
author: Lurlene McDaniel,  Someone Dies, Someone Lives

quote: It goes with a courageous intent to greet the universe as it really is, not to foist our emotional predispositions on it but to courageously accept what our explorations tell us.
author: Carl Sagan,  The Varieties of Scientific Experience: A Personal View of the Search for God

quote: A man with outward courage dares to die; a man with inner courage dares to live.
author: Lao Tzu,  Tao Te Ching

quote: Real courage is doing the right thing when nobody's looking. Doing the unpopular thing because it's what you believe, and the heck with everybody.
author: Justin Cronin,  The Summer Guest

quote: To change the world takes time; to change yourself takes courage.
author: R.S. Lowel

quote: We believe in ordinary acts of bravery, in the courage that drives one person to stand up for another.
author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent

quote: When I step out on stage in front of thousands of people, I don't feel that I'm being brave. It can take much more courage to express true feelings to one person. [...] In spite of the risks, the courage to be honest and intimate opens the way to self-discovery. It offers what we all want, the promise of love.
author: Michael Jackson,  Dancing the Dream

quote: You can't test courage cautiously.” (Annie Dillard)
author: Marcia Quinn Noren,  Joan of Arc: The Mystic Legacy

quote: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: A lot of pieces I have written have to do with courage. As a result, people think that I am naturally brave. But what people don't know, is that I grew up with phobias and many fears. I was scared of everything. So, I write of courage not because I have not known fear, but I write of courage because I have walked with fear but I have made the choice not to fear it.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Cynicism is what passes for insight when courage is lacking.
author: Anita Roddick

quote: The secret of happiness is freedom, the secret of freedom is courage.
author: Carrie Jones,  Need

quote: Scared is what you're feeling. Brave is what you're doing.
author: Emma Donoghue,  Room

quote: To live greatly, we must develop the capacity to face trouble with courage, disappointment with cheerfulness, and triumph with humility.
author: Thomas S. Monson,  Pathways To Perfection: Discourses Of Thomas S. Monson

quote: To do the useful thing, to say the courageous thing, to contemplate the beautiful thing: that is enough for one man's life.
author: T.S. Eliot,  The Use of Poetry and the Use of Criticism

quote: One cannot answer for his courage when he has never been in danger.
author: François de La Rochefoucauld,  Maxims

quote: Knowledge without courage is sterile.
author: Baltasar Gracián

quote: The more you are motivated by Love, The more Fearless & Free your action will be.
author: Dalai Lama XIV

quote: Be courageous and He shall strengthen your heart, all of you who hope in the Lord.
author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: King James Version

quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: That was courage, Keller thought. Not doing something without being afraid, but doing something even though you were afraid.
author: L.J. Smith,  Witchlight

quote: A brave man acknowledges the strength of others.
author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent

quote: Courage and perseverance have a magical talisman, before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish into air.
author: John Quincy Adams
